title: The Favorites - NFL Divisional Playoffs Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Divisional Playoffs Best Bets
description:
There are just 7 games left in the NFL season, and the Action Network wants you to get the most out of every game. That's why Chief Content Officer Chad Millman welcomes back his most cherish friend, professional bettor Simon Hunter, to narrow down their bets on all four Divisional Round playoff games this weekend. We hear about their love for the Kansas City Chiefs and their fade of the crumbling Buccaneers' offensive line. We also hear an update from producer and Buffalo Bills superfan Matt Mitchell about how to strip a hospital room of its assets, and how to win the hearts and minds of your neighbors during playoff season. We get a round of Sharp Calls from Simon's professional betting cohort, and we end with a combination Foxhole / Big Balls Bet of the Week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
